snap(10000,-99,-99)

sky(0,0,0)
fog(0,0,0) 
ground(255,255,255)
polys(1,0,0)

fadefrom(2000)
density(8421503)

lightson()

name(Death Pit)
nlaps(10)

set(47,0,0,250,0)

set(30,4000,-200,-10000,-90)
set(30,4000,1200,-10000,-90)
set(30,4000,2600,-10000,-90)
set(30,4000,4000,-10000,-90)
set(30,4000,5400,-10000,-90)
set(30,4000,6800,-10000,-90)
set(30,4000,8200,-10000,-90)
set(30,4000,9600,-10000,-90)
set(30,4000,11000,-10000,-90)
set(30,4000,12400,-10000,-90)
set(30,4000,13800,-10000,-90)

set(30,2800,16400,-10000,-45)

set(30,-50,17600,-10000,0)
set(30,-1450,17600,-10000,0)
set(30,-2850,17600,-10000,0)
set(30,-4250,17600,-10000,0)
set(30,-5650,17600,-10000,0)
set(30,-7050,17600,-10000,0)
set(30,-8450,17600,-10000,0)
set(30,-9850,17600,-10000,0)
set(30,-11250,17600,-10000,0)

set(30,-14050,17600,-10000,0)

set(30,-16900,16400,-10000,45)

set(30,-2850,-4000,-10000,180)
set(30,-4250,-4000,-10000,180)
set(30,-5650,-4000,-10000,180)

set(30,-9850,-4000,-10000,180)
set(30,-11250,-4000,-10000,180)
set(30,-12650,-4000,-10000,180)
set(30,-14050,-4000,-10000,180)

set(30,2800,-2800,-10000,-135)


maxt(6,18600,-19100)
maxb(6,-5000,-19100)
maxl(6,-19100,-5000)
maxr(6,4000,-5000)


set(10,0,4000,-10000,0)p
set(10,0,9600,-10000,0)p
set(48,0,13600,-10000,45)
chk(14,0,13600,-10000,-90)
fix(41,0,13600,-10000,-45)
set(10,-4500,13600,-10000,90)
set(10,-10100,13600,-10000,90)
set(48,-14100,13600,-10000,-45)
chk(14,-14100,13600,-10000,0)
fix(41,-14100,13600,-10000,45)
set(10,-14100,9600,-10000,0)
set(10,-14100,4000,-10000,0)
set(48,-14100,0,-10000,45)
chk(14,-14100,0,-10000,90)
fix(41,-14100,0,-10000,135)
set(10,-10100,0,-10000,90)
set(10,-4500,0,-10000,90)
set(48,0,0,-10000,-45)
chk(14,0,0,-10000,180)
fix(41,0,0,-10000,-135)
